result.name: freedom-of-information-foi-requests-database
result.notes: Case management system for FoI requests received by the Ministry of Justice (MoJ) categorised by: date received; name of applicant; whether information requested is held; exemptions used (if applicable); and date of response.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice

result.title: Ministry of Justice  FoI requests

extras.value: The following statistical publications are made using data from this source: Freedom of Information Act: Statistics on Implementation in Central Government (MoJ data only)
